author: parithosh
content:
We're using these configs for Hive: https://github.com/ethereum/hive/blob/master/configs/cancun.yaml

The hive tests have been updated with the new address for 4788, we still seem to be having a lot of test failures. Could the EL devs have a look please?
https://hivecancun.ethdevops.io/

Atleast some of those seems like issues that could happen on testnets, so i'd say we should hold off on devnet-9 until hive looks more green. 

Let us know if we should trigger some update
